content: "The things that will destroy America are prosperity at any price, peace at any price, safety first instead of duty first, the love of soft living and the get rich quick theory of life." ~~~Theodore Roosevelt~~~
reply: "The things that will destroy America are prosperity at any price, peace at any price, safety first instead of duty first, the love of soft living and the get rich quick theory of life." ~~~Theodore Roosevelt~~~
title: Will they know.... if you are not free ....you are LOST WITHOUT HOPE?

content: DO we love LIBERTY, having had it handed to us at birth... for those who were born in the USA? Do we? DO we strive as hard to PRESERVE the ideas and ideals of our founding fathers.... as hard as they strove to foment them? Do we? And lastly.... but FAR from least..... WOULD WE be willing to die to preserve that which was founded for us.... no matter WHO would try to take it from us? Would we? "The things that will destroy America are prosperity at any price, peace at any price, safety first instead of duty first, the love of soft living and the get rich quick theory of life." ~~~Theodore Roosevelt~~~
reply: DO we love LIBERTY, having had it handed to us at birth... for those who were born in the USA? Do we? title: Will they know.... if you are not free ....you are LOST WITHOUT HOPE?

content: I hope so... I truly do. It is my fear, however, that we have had it too easy for too long, and as a Nation seem to have lost the National Spirit and National Identity that made us who and what we were..... we seem to be lost without direction. We have seemingly become a Nation of victims; never willing to accept fault or responsibility for anything. I fear within my, or definitely my childrens lifetime, this Country that I love will see some very Dark Times. I hope with all my heart that we still have women and men who are ready to Stand and Sacrifice for this Great Country. My $0.02 Zack "The things that will destroy America are prosperity at any price, peace at any price, safety first instead of duty first, the love of soft living and the get rich quick theory of life." ~~~Theodore Roosevelt~~~

content: Silent_Surface; I believe there are some, but the problem is, they are not sure where to start, and there is no leader, or nobody they are willing to follow after because the people fear the government-- We need men like our founders who were not afraid of what might happen to them if they rose up against the king..but there are none.. There are people who speak of it, and talk about it, but there is none that follow after them or few who do, but they are targeted by the government as a threat..and quickly quelled out of existence. So maybe there are none willing to die for the freedoms that were paid for by so much blood.. they are willing to fight in other countries, for these freedoms for others..but when theirs are being slowly taken away...No..they will not die to keep them for themselves..they will not even vote the people out of office..which is what many claim is 'the only thing to do.'

title: Will they know.... if you are not free ....you are LOST WITHOUT HOPE?

content: i have often commented that, with all our freedoms, we have forgotten what they are. we want OUR freedoms, and are willing to eschew those, so that others may not enjoy them. i have said, since i was 12, that for "a land of the free, America has more laws than most other countries" we are litigious, we are willing to forget our neigbbour's freedom, so we may profit (lawsuits, unions, picketting, and political will) i expect one day WE will have a tyrant so evil and so wicked, that we will have elected him before we knew what he was, andd THEN, and only THEN, we'll know what we have lost. and THEN we will have leaders who will lead us BACK to the path of freedom, but the cost will be high. it will be worth every penny, every drop of blood, every generation that will look back at it and say, "we really strayed there" but today, we are blissfully ignorant of freedom, and only pay lip service to it
reply: i have often commented that, with all our freedoms, we have forgotten what they are. we want OUR freedoms, and are willing to eschew those, so that others may not enjoy them. i have said, since i was 12, that for "a land of the free, America has more laws than most other countries" we are litigious, we are willing to forget our neigbbour's freedom, so we may profit (lawsuits, unions, picketting, and political will) i expect one day WE will have a tyrant so evil and so wicked, that we will have elected him before we knew what he was, andd THEN, and only THEN, we'll know what we have lost. and THEN we will have leaders who will lead us BACK to the path of freedom, but the cost will be high. it will be worth every penny, every drop of blood, every generation that will look back at it and say, "we really strayed there" but today, we are blissfully ignorant of freedom, and only pay lip service to it

content: There are many patriots who will sacrifice all if a threat to freedom comes from outside our country. Knowing well the thoughts and concerns of two sons who enlisted, the Sololiquy of Ben Franklin still refers to many fine Americans who would make him proud were he here today. There are also many Americans who have traded principles, work ethics, and responsibility as patriots and defenders of our freedom for an easier life where others would provide for them without much of any contribution to country. A threat to many established freedoms is emerging from within our very country from some Americans. Will we be so willing to give all then, should it come to that? Enemies foreign and domestic? I would hope so.
reply: There are many patriots who will sacrifice all if a threat to freedom comes from outside our country. Knowing well the thoughts and concerns of two sons who enlisted, the Sololiquy of Ben Franklin still refers to many fine Americans who would make him proud were he here today. There are also many Americans who have traded principles, work ethics, and responsibility as patriots and defenders of our freedom for an easier life where others would provide for them without much of any contribution to country. A threat to many established freedoms is emerging from within our very country from some Americans. Will we be so willing to give all then, should it come to that? Enemies foreign and domestic? I would hope so.

There are many others who are willing to stand up and fight and die for this country. It is time that Americans stop being intimidated by the liberal appeasement apologists who call us "intolerant" when we stand up for what is right, moral and honest; or "arrogant" for believing there is no better place on earth than America and "proud" of what this nation has accomplished here and all around the world. Even on this forum there are those who say we should "apologize" to the world for our "arrogance". We should apologize for defending and freeing millions of people around the world? For being the first country after any disaster, natural or man-made, to arrive with medicine, doctors, rescuers, materials to rebuild/recover? For being the example of what life can be like when people are free? To those who say we should apologize, there are planes and ships leaving every day for some other nation, and to please feel free to use those means of transportation and don't come back.

content: Ya know when I saw this...man....make his apologies to nations that have had thousands of years TRYING to become what we have become in less than two hundred it made me feel like PUKING!!! When I saw him grab his ankles for the Saudi king, it made me almost put a bullet through my T.V.!! EXAMPLE when Checkoslovakia fell apart, when Yugoslavia exploded who had to go fix it?? US, that's who!! We listened for almost two years how it was OUR responsibilty to do, while those whose security we have provided for more than sixty years berated us!! Those whose countries we rebuilt with the Marsahall plan BERATED US!!! Who do these exccuses for "people" think they are??!! And!! Just WHO are the AMERICANS that would side with them against their own nation and denigrate us who have sacrificed treasure, blood, and the lives of our own youth, so these SWINE can deride us and call us provincial, backward dolts!! Screw Europe, Screw China, and the rest of them AND screw those who CALL themselves Americans but are little more than apoligists for the scum that berates their own country! Keep pushing me people, and someday I'll tell ya what I REALLY think!!
